os.fullname: OS Independent (Written in an interpreted language)
os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: OS Independent (Written in an interpreted language)

name: AZ Crossfire: HTML5 + JavaScript Game
short_description:
[AZ Crossfire - Version 0.1 (Dated: January 24, 2015)]

This game is inspired by a Game Boy game (I forgot the title) wherein 2 ships (player & enemy (computer A.I.)) aims to destroy each other by firing lasers but the area of battle is filled with asteroids that might block each other's line on fire. The game is still under improvement but can be played already :)

This game is HTML5 based so there shouldn't be someone releasing an installer or executable ("*.exe" version is a big "NO" for security reasons) version. Just open the "index.html" file from your web browser and the game should be running normally :)

Note: HTML5 is an interpreted language and most web browsers are cross-platform so therefore this game can be played in Linux, Mac, and Windows.

If you want to provide files such as images (sprites and/or backgrounds) and/or sounds (effects and/or BGM), please e-mail me at jdp2ga@yahoo.com. Thanks!

Website: www.geocities.ws/jdp2ga
summary: A space shooting / shooter game. Arcade type game.
